```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}

exempt_orgs <- read_csv("data/eo_md.csv")

churches <- exempt_orgs |> 
  filter(FOUNDATION == "10") |> 
  mutate(zip5 = str_sub(ZIP, 1, 5))

write_csv(churches, "data/churches_md.csv")
```
